description: The appliance license state has changed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStateTrap BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusApplicationName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusFeatureName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusComponentName s EXAMPLE BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusExpireType i 0 BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusExpireDate s EXAMPLEE BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusLicenseState i 0

description: This variable indicates the application name of the license entry.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusApplicationName

description: This variable indicates the feature name of the license entry.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusFeatureName

description: This variable indicates the component name of the license entry.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusComponentName

description: This variable indicates the type of license expiration.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusExpireType

description: This variable indicates the license entry expiration date
variables.name: BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusExpireDate

description: This variable indicates the state of the license entry.
variables.name: BLUECOAT-LICENSE-MIB::appLicenseStatusLicenseState
